backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding-related features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files providing high-level descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining neutral and primary color variables plus dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps HomePage in AppErrorBoundary as the root app component.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports static paths for logo and hero background images.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary displaying a fallback UI with reload option and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Renders the logo image with size options and text fallback on load failure.
Footer with logo, support email, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
Page layout wrapper providing main content area and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context/provider managing login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining warm neutral and emerald/teal design tokens for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero image, branding, introduction text, and feature cards using Tailwind and custom UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the Smart Janghai website.
